item.description:
Don't Call Me Shirley (DCMS) is at The Tap in Haverhill, lets go out and listen to the great music they play, do some dancing and socializing.

We have followed DCMS at various venues and absolutely love this band. Although they have lost a band member, they are still awesome.

The band goes on at 9pm but lets get to The Tap at 8pm in order to reserve our table, have some dinner or appy's and socialize before the music starts.

Please remember, its that time of year where weather could possibly cancel this event. Please check back on the website prior to leaving for this event.

Haven't paid your dues yet this year? Please be prepared to pay your yearly dues at this event. Yearly dues goes to the cost of maintaining the Meetup Site, event costs and incidentals. Please make sure you stay current with your yearly dues.

So grab those dancing shoes and come on down to The Tap.

Hope to see you all there
Janet & Donna
item.name: DCMS at The Tap in Haverhill
